Mandela Effect

HTML Fixed Sidebar Bootstrap Template

< Previous Theme > Next Theme

Bootstrap 4 HTML template with fixed sidebar navigation.

Mandela Effect is a responsive HTML Fixed Sidebar Bootstrap Template, compatible with Bootstrap 4, free for personal and commercial use.
